name: Rob Lucci
text: When Attacking DON!! -1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck): Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.

effect.text: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.

meta.notes: Rarity is 'C' as printed in the bottom right corner. The card is a sample, but all fields are filled based on visible text.
